ValidationRule.description: You cannot edit the subject for "Poor response on a survey". Contact your SF Admin if the subject needs to be changed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISCHANGED(Subject), BEGINS(PRIORVALUE(Subject), 'Poor response on a survey'), /*Allow the following two profiles to make this change*/ $Profile.Id <> '00e40000000nYck', /*Frontier System Administrator*/ $Profile.Id <> '00e40000000nTsD' /*System Administrator*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot edit the subject for "Poor response on a survey". Contact your SF Admin if the subject needs to be changed.
